content: this lightweight hoodie is perfect to throw on during a chilly summer evening at the beach or cozied up in around a bonfire the in-style oversized fit compliments all body shapes and sizes get ready to never take off your new favorite hoodie this pattern is available as a kit through lion brand get it here 1 you can find the pattern free on my blog 2 1 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1026079&u=1715627&m=72611&urllink=www%2elionbrand%2ecom%2fkits%2fcrochet%2dkit%2dhappy%2dat%2dhome%2dhoodie%2ehtml&afftrack=ravelry 2 https //www eandpcrochet com/happy-at-home-hoodie-pattern/
